captions.text: Rabbits are animals that get stressed very easily, and these must always be sedated in as calm situations

In many ocasions and at first sight, we can see that these teeth have not grown correctly.
In rabbits and small mammals, their teeth grow during
all their life, and when they don't match properly, these defects appear. This way,
